value.value: The Prashar Lake trek is fit for individuals of all interest- and expertise levels. Sounds exciting, doesn't it?! With views fit for a king, the trail, leading to the lake region i.e. from the city of Mandi to the little village of Baggi, become private and exclusive to every group that visits. It is of prime importance to remain hydrated and careful during every part of the journey owing to unpredictable, slippery paths and the formation of ice on the surfaces. The setting of the campsite in Prashar Lake location is yet another pleasant surprise because of its closeness to the water and its harmony with nature.

value.heading: About the Destination
value.value:
Prashar Lake trek (2,730m), which happily takes people to the lake which is completely frozen in the winter and a dazzling beauty otherwise, is considered to be an important trek in Himachal Pradesh. The picture-perfect blue water lake is surrounded by the majestic Dhauladhar Ranges in Kullu Valley and it is always kept as a secret in the Mandi district of Himachal Pradesh. If you set out for a trek to Prashar Lake, you will be going through the charming trails crossing the forests and several small streams. 
As you climb the trails up, you will come to meet the local people and it is the best chance to know the indigenous culture closely. Also, once you finish the trek, you will have the satisfied heart filled with plenty of beautiful views of Dhauladhar, Pir Panjal and Kinnaur mountain ranges.
Alongside, there is a surprisingly beautiful attraction near the lake that is the local temple of Prashar Rishi which has a lot of significant architectural brilliance carved on the walls. The style perfectly matches with the landscape around the lake and thus it is a favourite tourist attraction in the region. If you're in the mood for some outdoor adventure and want these memories to be etched forever, then make Prashar Lake the destination of your choice!

value.heading: Day 1 Mandi– Baghi Village - Prashar Lake
value.value:
• Reach Baghi Village from Mandi which is 50 kms away (Shared Taxi’s)
  • Breakfast at Baghi Villag
  • Trek to Prashar Lake is around 8 Kms, packed lunch can be done during the trek
  • Most part of the trek is through lush green forests, along a stream with numerous waterfalls
  • As you reach the top you see Alpine meadows and the magnificent lake on your Left
  • Visit the Prashar Rishi Temple, take blessings & make new wishes to the deity
  • Spend some time at the lake & Capture the Himalayan Silhouette during sunset
  • There are couple of local dhabba's n Shops around Lake where you can grab hot Tea or a quick
  • Snacks
  • Snacks + Dinner (Bonfire if possible if Allowed)
  • Camping under the Stars at Prashar Lake (outside of the Fence)

value.heading: Day 2 Prashar Lake – Baghi Village– Mandi
value.value:
• Sunrise Photography with 360 panaromic view of the mighty Himalayas
  • Form these hills you can have clear shots of the Himalayan Ranges
  • Snow covered Dhauladhar Ranges + Bada Bhangal on the West
  • Great Himalayan National Park + Deo Tibba in the East
  • Breakfast at the Lake + Trek back to Baghi Village
  • Taxis will be available at baghi for Transfer to Mand
  • Collect Luggage + Departure to Delhi, Volvo arrives at around 7pm

details.heading: Meals
details.value:
• 2 breakfast 1 Lunch 1 Dinner
  • A lot of emphasis is given to nutritional needs and a menu of vegetarian dishes is prepared accordingly.
  • Tea/coffee will be served throughout.
  • Refreshments (2 refreshments maggi + soup)

details.heading: Other Inclusion
details.value:
• High quality trekking equipment’s (Tents, Mattress, Sleeping bags)
  • Camping stools Aid, Medical Kit, First Aid Kit
  • Forest Permits/Camping Charges
  • Trek guide
  • Bonfire

details.heading: Transport
details.value: Toyota Innova, Mahindra Xylo, Mahindra Scorpio, Tempo Traveller and no local jeeps or similar vehicles are used except where there are short transfers from the lodge to the trek points. The transport tariff includes all driver charges, fuel, parking, toll and taxes.

details.heading: Things To Carry
details.value:
• A sturdy backpack (60ltrs) with a plastic or water-proof lining
  • High-ankle waterproof (Goretex)trekking shoes with good grip
  • Trekking pole or stick
  • Wardrobe essentials like woollen and fleece clothes, synthetic or waterproof track pants, rain-proof jackets, sunglasses, waterproof gloves, wind-proof jackets, thermal innerwear
  • Moisturizer, Sun Screen Lotion, Lip Balm
  • Personal Medicine Kit
  • Insulated water bottle and hydration pack (optional)
  • Torch / Flashlight (with extra batteries)
  • Extra Polythene bags

details.heading: Clothing
details.value:
• 1 pair of thermals (upper + lower)
  • 2 pairs of Quick Dry Warm lower or Track Pants.
  • Full sleeves T-shirts/ Sweatshirts.
  • 2-3 pair of socks
  • Undergarments. Qty - 1 for every day of trekking
  • 1 warm/feather jacket
  • Gloves and head cover

details.heading: Advisory
details.value:
• Travel in small groups
  • Proper waste disposal
  • Respect local cultures and be sensitive towards wildlife
  • Porter services for carrying personal belongings throughout the trek (not more than 10 kgs) are optional additions that can be availed for Rs. 800
  • Personal trekking gear and that can be availed at an additional cost
  • General precautions and steps are to be taken to initiate good acclimatization with the assistance of guides
  • Those suffering from an ailment or heart disease, Diabetes, breathing problems, high altitude sickness or is pregnant cannot participate in this trek

details.heading: Cancellation Policy & Confirmation Policy
details.value:
• Cancel up to 15 days before trip start date and get full refund.
  • Cancel up to 10 days before trip start date and get 70% refund.
  • Cancel up to 7 days before trip start date and get 50% refund.
  • Cancel within 7 days of trip start date and the cost of the full reservation is non-refundable
  • The customer receives an acknowledgement via email within 24 hours of successful booking
  • In case the preferred slots are unavailable, an alternate schedule of the customer’s preference will be arranged and a new confirmation will be sent via email.

details.heading: Refund Policy
details.value: • The applicable refund amount will be processed within 5 business day

value.heading: Temperature
value.value: 16 to 25 degrees (days) and 8 to 16 degrees (nights) during March, 14 to 22  degrees (days) and 6 to14 degrees (nights) between September and December
